New Records: Messi became the fastest player in MLS history to reach 25 goal contributions with 12g/13a in 12 matches.
Key Match Events: Messi scored his first goal for Argentina since October, tapping in from just outside the six-yard box in the 12th minute.
Messi scored his second goal in the 77th minute, latching onto a service by Ángel Di María and clipping over the onrushing goalkeeper.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nicholas Hagen attempted a first-time pass out of the back which was picked off by Messi, leading to Messi's first goal.
